text: Fausta Simona Morganti (20 August 1944 â€“ 2 February 2021) was a Sammarinese politician. She was one of the two Captains Regent of San Marino. Morganti was elected for the six-months term from 1 April 2005 to 1 October 2005, with Cesare Gasperoni. Morganti was a member of the Party of Democrats. She died of COVID-19 in San Marino on 2 February 2021, aged 76.Addio a Fausta Morganti, bandiera della sinistra sammarinese Corriereromagna.it ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Sammarinese people
title: Fausta Morganti
